hero.description: Hana automatically summarizes content, manages tabs intelligently, and boosts your productivity 3x - completely automated and non-intrusive.

howItWorks.title: How Does Hana Work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Just 3 simple steps to start browsing smarter. No complex setup required - Hana handles everything automatically for you.

step1.title: Install the Extension
step1.description: Add Hana to Chrome with just one click from the Chrome Web Store. Completely free, no registration required, no email needed. The extension is super lightweight and won't slow down your browser.

step2.title: Browse as Usual
step2.description: Continue browsing the web normally - read news, research, work. Hana runs silently in the background, automatically analyzing the content you're viewing, summarizing long articles, and organizing tabs intelligently by topic.

step3.title: Get Smart Insights
step3.description: Click the Hana icon anytime to see a summary of the current page, content insights, and AI-personalized suggestions. You can also ask Hana anything about what you're reading.

dashboard.title: Powerful Analytics Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Comprehensive tracking of your browsing habits. View detailed time saved through AI summaries, number of articles read, frequently visited websites, and weekly/monthly productivity analysis. Set personal goals and track your progress.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Designed for maximum productivity with cutting-edge AI technology

feature1.title: Smart Summarization
feature1.description: AI analyzes and summarizes any article in just seconds. Grasp key points from long articles, research papers, or technical documentation without reading everything. Supports multiple languages and customizable summary length.

feature2.title: Lightning Fast & Lightweight
feature2.description: Optimized down to every byte. Hana uses smart caching, lazy loading, and background processing to ensure it never slows down your browser regardless of how many tabs you open. Uses less than 50MB RAM.

feature3.title: Absolute Security
feature3.description: Your data is processed locally on your machine, never sent to any server. We don't collect browsing history, no tracking, no ads. Our codebase is regularly security audited.

feature4.title: Project Context Management
feature4.description: Organize work by individual projects. Hana remembers the context of each project, automatically applying industry terminology and appropriate vocabulary when switching between projects. Perfect for freelancers and teams working on multiple projects.

cta.title: Ready to Upgrade Your Browser?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who have transformed the way they interact with the web. Start saving 2 hours every day today.

privacy.comparison: Unlike other AI assistants, Hana never accesses or stores your personal data

questions.isFreeAnswer: Yes! Hana is completely free. No hidden fees, no credit card required, and you can use it forever.
questions.dataProtectionAnswer: All data is processed locally on your computer. We don't collect, store, or access your browsing history.
questions.browserSpeed: Does Hana slow down my browser?
questions.browserSpeedAnswer: Not at all! Hana uses under 50MB RAM and is optimized with background processing. You won't notice any slowdown.
questions.browsersAnswer: Hana works on Chrome, Edge, and all Chromium-based browsers like Brave, Arc, and Opera.
